intro: Coccocypselum obovatum, commonly known as the broad-leafed coccocypselum, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its broad, ovate leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It produces capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Coccocypselum obovatum is often found in humid, shaded environments such as forests and along riverbanks.
